text: Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
When we see our enemies are made of suffering, we can drop our anger and fear and extend a hand.
Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
If you are facing the right direction, all you need to do is keep walking.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
When you are present, you can allow the mind to be as it is without getting entangled in it.
Concentration is a cornerstone of mindfulness practice.
What you are is what you have been. What you'll be is what you do now.
Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.
Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
Your work is to discover your work and then with all your heart to give yourself to it.
If a man's thoughts are muddy, If he is reckless and full of deceit, How can he wear the yellow robe? Whoever is master of his own nature, Bright, clear and true, He may indeed wear the yellow robe.
